page.title: 18SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: Life in school today is alright.We get to mix with other children and have our own classroom in school,with our teacher who tells us what to do.Our school time is from 9a.m.until 3.15p.m.We get a break at 10.30 for 15 minutes to play and a break for lunch from 12.15 to 1.15.We have raised a lot of money these past few years for charity by having jumble sales, sponsored things etc.Recently we worked for the Ethiopia Appeal. Some of the things we study are Arithmetic, English,Project work, Poetry, Stories and computer work.We also have some activities like craft, television,gym, art and music. We work in groups in the class and there are 33 pupils in my class,13 boys and 20 girls.
